channel.title: Player Dialogue problem

item.title: Player Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

i did 377 deob just my interfaces loaded so i could login and still some half ass steel helm

but i will retry sec

wtf now it works :+? with 377 deob mabye its because of my custom items

I think i found out what gave me those steel helms my teletabs but its strange i didnt add models to get the teletabs just ints because the models where already in my cache or something and i realy need those tabs and also realy need the dialogues

Edit2: now when i added my tabs back they work also for some reason wtf…

[/quote]

No if only deleted an preload model that fixed my karamja map[/quote]

Try loading this on another client.

item.title: Player Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

I would tend to think that this would be a server-sided issue, most dialogues are used through your server. Though the models are not, could be client sided, I’ve never had this issue so I can only give bad tips like this one; sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

public void pTalk(String line1) { //sendFrame126(GetNpcName(3781), 4902); sendFrame126(playerName.replaceAll("_", " "), 970); sendFrame126(line1, 971); sendFrame185(969); sendFrame164(968); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

Try using that code. I warn you to copy and paste the original code into a notepad because I’m not an “expert” coder.

If that doesn’t work, try this:

public void pTalk(String line1) { //sendFrame126(GetNpcName(3781), 4902); sendFrame126(playerName.replaceAll("_", " "), 970); sendFrame126(line1); sendFrame185(969); sendFrame164(968); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

And if that doesn’t work, I did my best. Remember how I said to put the original code into a notepad in case you get any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

For some reason my player dialogue started doing weird??

im not wearing an help and it shows that?

it had nothing to do with what i recently added because i tested it on an old backup and it appears too…

any help please

my pTalk void

public void pTalk(String line1, int faceAnim) { //sendFrame126(GetNpcName(3781), 4902); sendFrame200(969, faceAnim); sendFrame126(playerName.replaceAll("_", " "), 970); sendFrame126(line1, 971); sendFrame185(969); sendFrame164(968); NpcDialogueSend = true; }
